title: [港女世界第一] 今日路透社出咗一個香港前線手足嘅訪問

replies.msg:
《Reuters》路透社今日借國際婦女節，出咗一個香港女前線嘅訪問。

“We’re no longer weak, or the ones with ‘princess syndrome’. So I think now, we are evolving like Pokemon, we’re on another level. We’re different.”
「我地唔再係弱者或者有公主病，已經好似Pokemon咁進行咗去另一個層次，唔再一樣。」

原文：
https://uk.reuters.com/article/uk-womens-day-hongkong-protester/evolving-like-pokemon-hong-kong-women-step-up-to-protest-frontlines-idUKKBN20U087

轉載至：https://www.facebook.com/goodbyehkhellouk/photos/a.155136541681491/765734270621712/?type=3&theater
